Title: {{title}}
===============

**Announcement for Request for Information (RFI)**

**Title:**
Graph Database and Visualization Solution

**Reference Number:**
PW-22-01003864

**Announcement Date:**
August 10, 2022

**Closing Date for RFI Response:**
September 22, 2022 @ 14:00 (ET)

**Overview:**

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking industry input on the capabilities and availability of a Graph Database and Visualization Solution that meets the Agency's business requirements. This Request for Information (RFI) serves as a non-binding and non-committal invitation to provide information on the availability of such solutions.

**Required Information:**

The CRA is interested in gathering information on the following:

* Industry capabilities and availability of Graph Database and Visualization solutions that align with the CRA's business requirements
* Technical specifications and features of existing Graph Database and Visualization solutions
* Implementation experience and success stories related to Graph Database and Visualization solutions

**Contract Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Canada Revenue Agency
* Solicitation Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Trade Agreements: None

**Contact Information:**

Hamza Khangui, CRA Procurement Officer
hamza.khangui@cra-arc.gc.ca
(438)-459-7160



**Attachments:**

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/19/0ed085a7ac72257c9d1f251d3b2376d2/1000405070_graph_database_and_visualization_solution_rfi_en_amd_001.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/10/a6d79ae5bed68f5ceaca50ade2ebb1a6/1000405070_rfi_graph_database_and_visualization_en.pdf
